name: unblended
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unblended drink, liquid, or product contains only one type of that product, not two or more mixed together: Vintage port is high-quality, unblended wine that has been aged in the bottle for at least 12 years. This is organic unblended milk, from a single herd of grass-fed Jersey cows. Opposite
blended
More examplesFewer examplesI've always preferred my malt whisky unblended.Some of the best-known unblended wines are red burgundy (pinot noir) and riesling.We offer the highest quality, unblended coffee beans at about half the normal price.
